author: hwright
msg: Update the command-line client to use the new client log APIs introduced in
Implement the svn_log_message_receiver2_t interface, and use fields of the
svn_log_entry_t structure instead of discrete parameters.
(svn_cl__log): Call the new client API, svn_client_log4().

author: hwright
msg: Rev the client API to use the svn_log_message_receiver2_t interface, and update
(svn_client_log4): Use the new receiver interface, and the new ra API.
(svn_client_log3): Implement as a wrapper around svn_client_log4().

author: hwright
msg: Rev the ra APIs to use the svn_log_message_receiver2_t interface, and update
the various ra backends to use the svn_repos_get_logs4() API.
(compat_get_log): Wrap the new receiver interface with the old one.
(svn_ra_get_log): Implement as a wrapper around svn_ra_get_log2().
(svn_ra_local__get_log): Use the new receiver interface and repos log API.
(log_info_t): Use an svn_log_entry_t member instead of discrete members for
(push_state): Create and use the fields of the log_entry member of the log
(end_log): Use the log_entry member of the log info structure.
(ra_svn_log): Use the new receiver interface.  Create and use an
(log_baton): Use an svn_log_entry_t member instead of discrete members for
(reset_log_item, log_end_element): Use the log_entry member of log_baton.

author: xsteve
msg: (svn-status-repo-for-path): Bugfix: set the default-directory in the
*svn-process* buffer correct, otherwise this function returned
wrong results if the *svn-process* used a different default-directory

author: hwright
msg: Add a compatibility wrapper generator for svn_log_message_receiver2_t.
(log_wrapper_baton): Baton used for wrapping log message receivers.
(log_wrapper_callback): Callback used for wrapping log message receivers.
(svn_repos_get_logs3): Use the new compatibility wrapper generator, instead
